channel.title: Docs on reno
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on reno

item.title: Installation
item.description: Binary packages You can download the latest binary package from here or from the GitHub release page. Linux (x64) 1.) Download the latest version: reno-linux-x64.zip 2.) Run it: ./reno Generic (Java) 1.) Download the latest version: reno-0.2.0.jar 2.) Run it: java -jar reno-0.2.0.jar

item.title: Usage
item.description: Usage Usage: reno dump reno update reno debug-show reading notes extractor Options and flags: --help Display this help text. --version, -v Print the version number and exit. Subcommands: dump Dump the annotations from the given Pdf update update the notes in the Org-file with new annotations from the Pdf debug-show debug show each annotation with meta informations Dump annotations to an org-file Usage: reno dump [--overwrite] [--pdf-engine <value>] [--mark-from <value>] <pdf> [<org>] Dump the annotations from the given Pdf Options and flags: --help Display this help text.

item.title: Example
item.description: Reading notes I use reno to add some reading notes: From this marked PDF Document: i get (after some edits) this org-mode snippet: where i can change some quotes to headers edit exported text add some notes for me Play with code I can mark some challenges: include some org-babel source blocks to solve the challenges: and export it from Emacs as Pdf to read it later again:

item.title: Contact / Support
item.description: Contact Check my GitHub Profile for my mail address. Send me an direct message on twitter. Use keybase to contact me. Support If you have any questions, trouble or other input, feel free to contact me directly (see Contact) or open a issue@github.
